page.title: 06EMPLOYMENT-PORTPATRICK.
page.content: Apart from seasonal hotel work employment prospects in the village are dismal.A few people are employed in the local shops,radio station and on the range vessel.Others are self-employed and at present a few are part of an M.S.C.group repairing the fabric of the ruined church. Lack of employment leads to young people,especially the better qualified, leaving the district to seek work. Most people in employment work outwith the village,many in Stranraer, while a very few are employed on local farms.
